description.value:
Twin sister of Aminthar and the Lady of Hateful Flame, Alaminna is the Agony of all-consuming fire. After her torment at the hands of Golannoth, she has become the very embodiment of the wildfire.

Edicts: Destroy at your whim, allow natural disasters to take their due, swear vengeance.

Anathema: Spare those you swore vengeance against, forgive a slight, douse fires.
